title: Population in urban agglomerations of more than 1 million (% of total population)
name: en.urb.mcty.tl.zs
readme: Population in urban agglomerations of more than one million is the percentage of a countrys population living in metropolitan areas that in 2000 had a population of more than one million people.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Population in urban agglomerations of more than one million is the percentage of a countrys population living in metropolitan areas that in 2000 had a population of more than one million people.
